summary: This document is an email chain from July 13, 2021, regarding a press inquiry from reporter Mary Margaret Olohan to the SDNY. The inquiry asks for comment on defense attorney David Markus's assertion that he did not violate SDNY rules by writing an op-ed comparing Bill Cosby and Ghislaine Maxwell. The forwarded email indicates SDNY declined to comment.
